query.statement:
SELECT PS.PSPID ,MA.ZSITE_NM ,PS.POSID ,PS.GUBUN ,CASE PS.GUBUN WHEN '10' THEN 'EL' WHEN '11' THEN 'ES' WHEN '20' THEN 'ÁÖÂ÷±â' ELSE '' END AS GUBUN_NM ,PS.LIFNR ,(SELECT M.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M WHERE M.MANDT = PS.MANDT AND M.LIFNR = PS.LIFNR) AS NAME1 ,PS.PRO_R ,INT(SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(PS.WAERS,PS.WRBTR)) AS WRBTR ,PS.WAERS ,PS.BELNR ,PS.BDATE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0120 AS PS ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS MA WHERE PS.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PS.MANDT = MA.MANDT AND PS.PSPID = MA.POSID
AND PS.BDATE BETWEEN #DATEF# AND #DATET#
AND PS.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND PS.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND MA.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
ORDER BY PS.LIFNR,PS.PSPID,PS.POSID
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
